rdf:about="http://www.zotero.org/support/lib/tpl/zotero-theme/images/favicon.ico">         <title>Zotero Documentation</title>         <link>http://www.zotero.org/support/</link>         <url>http://www.zotero.org/support/lib/tpl/zotero-theme/images/favicon.ico</url>     </image>     <item rdf:about="http://www.zotero.org/support/terms/general_privacy_policy?rev=1221831966&do=diff">         <dc:format>text/html</dc:format>         <dc:date>2008-09-19T09:46:06-04:00</dc:date>         <title>terms:general_privacy_policy</title>         <link>http://www.zotero.org/support/terms/general_privacy_policy?rev=1221831966&do=diff</link>         <description>As a university-based project intended to foster scholarship and intellectual collaboration, Zotero takes privacy very seriously. We collect some data in order to provide optimal service to you:   *  Voluntary communications: We store information regarding voluntary contact you have with us, including forum messages and correspondence involving zotero.org email addresses.</description>     </item>     <item rdf:about="http://www.zotero.org/support/terms/privacy?rev=1412142813&do=diff">         <dc:format>text/html</dc:format>         <dc:date>2014-10-01T01:53:33-04:00</dc:date>         <title>terms:privacy</title>         <link>http://www.zotero.org/support/terms/privacy?rev=1412142813&do=diff</link>         <description>Zotero is an open-source project committed to providing the best research tool available anywhere. Our philosophy is that what you put into Zotero is yours, and one of our founding principles is to make it as easy as possible to take the fruits of your research where and when you want it and to share it how you like--or to choose not to share it at all.</description>     </item>     <item rdf:about="http://www.zotero.org/support/terms/privacy_policy?rev=1412142931&do=diff">         <dc:format>text/html</dc:format>         <dc:date>2014-10-01T01:55:31-04:00</dc:date>         <title>terms:privacy_policy</title>         <link>http://www.zotero.org/support/terms/privacy_policy?rev=1412142931&do=diff</link>         <description>PRIVACY POLICY - PLEASE READ CAREFULLY  Welcome to zotero.org (the \ufffd\ufffd\ufffdSite\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd).  The Site is operated by the Corporation for Digital Scholarship (\ufffd\ufffd\ufffdCDS\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd) from its offices within the United States on a not-for-profit basis. CDS (\ufffd\ufffd\ufffdCDS\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd, \ufffd\ufffd\ufffdus\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd, \ufffd\ufffd\ufffdwe\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd or \ufffd\ufffd\ufffdour\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd) is committed to protecting the privacy of the users (\ufffd\ufffd\ufffduser\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd, \ufffd\ufffd\ufffdyou\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd or \ufffd\ufffd\ufffdyour\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd) of its Site.  Our Privacy Policy is designed to assist you in understanding how we collect, use and safeguard the information you provide to us and in making informed deci\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd</description>     </item>     <item rdf:about="http://www.zotero.org/support/terms/start?rev=1412716953&do=diff">         <dc:format>text/html</dc:format>         <dc:date>2014-10-07T17:22:33-04:00</dc:date>         <title>terms:start</title>         <link>http://www.zotero.org/support/terms/start?rev=1412716953&do=diff</link>         <description>The 'terms' namespace contains official Zotero pages that cannot be edited by unauthorized users.   *  terms_of_service  *  privacy  *  privacy_policy</description>     </item>     <item rdf:about="http://www.zotero.org/support/terms/terms_of_service?rev=1412628909&do=diff">         <dc:format>text/html</dc:format>         <dc:date>2014-10-06T16:55:09-04:00</dc:date>         <title>terms:terms_of_service</title>         <link>http://www.zotero.org/support/terms/terms_of_service?rev=1412628909&do=diff</link>         <description>ZOTERO TERMS OF SERVICE  Welcome to zotero.org (the \ufffd\ufffd\ufffdSite\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd). Zotero is a collection of services, including storage subscription services (the \ufffd\ufffd\ufffdServices\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd), integrated with the Zotero desktop software and the Site, operated by the Corporation for Digital Scholarship (\ufffd\ufffd\ufffdCDS\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd) from its offices within the United States on a not-for-profit basis. Your access to and use of the Services and the Site are subject to these Terms of Service (\ufffd\ufffd\ufffdTerms of Service\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd) and all applicable laws.  CDS makes no represen\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd</description>     </item>     <item rdf:about="http://www.zotero.org/support/terms/trademark?rev=1424745100&do=diff">         <dc:format>text/html</dc:format>         <dc:date>2015-02-23T21:31:40-04:00</dc:date>         <title>terms:trademark</title>         <link>http://www.zotero.org/support/terms/trademark?rev=1424745100&do=diff</link>         <description>This document is intended to explain the proper usage of Zotero trademarks and the relationship between these trademarks and the licensing of the Zotero software. We've tried to make the following explanation as simple as possible, but ultimately trademarks and copyright are legal matters. If you have any questions about when and how to use Zotero trademarks, you should contact an attorney.</description>     </item>     <item rdf:about="http://www.zotero.org/support/terms/zotero_server_privacy_policy?rev=1235162102&do=diff">         <dc:format>text/html</dc:format>         <dc:date>2009-02-20T15:35:02-04:00</dc:date>         <title>terms:zotero_server_privacy_policy</title>         <link>http://www.zotero.org/support/terms/zotero_server_privacy_policy?rev=1235162102&do=diff</link>         <description>In order to provide and ensure the quality of the Zotero server service, we store the following technical data:   *  Data associated with your account, such as login information (e.g. usernames)   *  Data associated with your sync activity, such as standard access logs that list IP addresses   *  Customized recommendations: server accounts may use Zotero library data to suggest, based on your preferences, works of scholarship that might be of interest.</description>     </item> </rdf:RDF>
